projects.name: Career Steps
projects.description: An EdTech platform to provide personalized career guidance and mentorship, helping students make informed career choices and achieve their career aspirations. The website offers a user-friendly interface, provides personalized results based on user input, is highly responsive, and includes voice access support. It features multilingual support with more than 100 languages, provides direct links to experts, and includes skill assessment and development courses. Users can access detailed information about colleges, career roadmaps, average salaries, and a comprehensive list of every possible career options.

projects.name: Ai Assistant
projects.description: A virtual assistant in Python is a computer program that performs tasks based on user commands or interactions. It can provide information, execute specific tasks-python. Created a user-friendly interface for interaction, incorporating features for voice input/output and text-based communication to cater to diverse user preferences. Created comprehensive documentation including user guides, API references, and troubleshooting resources to assist users in effectively utilizing the assistant and troubleshooting any issues they encounter.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Provide the live weather conditions. Used the Weather API to fetch the current weather conditions.

full_output.name: Anurag Vishwakarma
achievements_and_awards: Achieved Runner-Up position in Glitch TechFest Hackathon, demonstrating exceptional problem-solving skills, teamwork, and innovative thinking in a competitive environment.
